Name: Mint Limeade
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: Lightly MUDDLE (just to bruise) mint in base of shaker. Add next three ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with lemonade, lightly stir and serve with straws.
Review: Superbly refreshing, mint and lime served long.
History: Created in 2006 by yours truly (Simon Difford), London, England.
